alert.note: Alert for Thomas (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 10 at 4:17PM CDT until July 10 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM CDT FOR WESTERN THOMAS COUNTY... At 416 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Thedford, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...At 400 PM CDT, the public reported quarter sized hail 3 miles east of Seneca. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Thedford and Norway. This includes the following highways... Highway 2 between mile markers 201 and 210. Highway 83 between mile markers 139 and 148. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
